description: The Revel is a little bit casual, a little bit campfire, and everything you’re looking for in a shoe designed to help you relax, recover, and repeat as necessary. A slip-on boot at the intersection of cozy and comfortable, the Revel takes Chaco’s APMA-certified comfort and LUVSEAT™ arch-support and marries it with warm fleece-lined felted uppers. The Revel is the perfect, everyday cozy boot - and totally vegan.
name: Chaco Revel - Mens
